newsitem.title: USA: TCI Satellite delays satellite launch.
newsitem.headline: TCI Satellite delays satellite launch.

text.p: TCI Satellite Entertainment Inc said Thursday it is delaying the rescheduled launch of its high-powered tempo satellite until Friday morning between 0102 and 0200 EDT.
The company said it was also cancelling a media briefing that had been planned for noon Thursday.
The company blamed a telemetry processing computer malfunction at the Systems/Loral spacecraft mission control center in Palo Alto, California, for the the latest delay.
The launch was to be Thursday after an earlier cancellation of a Tuesday launch because of a battery problem.
